document.full_text: despite more than $50 billion spent on prisons, more than 40 percent of offenders are back behind bars within three years of release, a report on wednesday showed.
document.title: more than 40 percent of ex-cons return to jail
lines_and_colors: despite more than $50 billion spent on prisons, more than 40 percent of offenders are back behind bars within three years of release, a report on wednesday showed.
